hopobject.name: windows-embedded-bundle
hopobject.body: Arrow is your only source for this innovative hardware and software bundle! It’s based on the BeagleBoard-xM, and brings together a high-performance Texas Instruments ARM® Cortex™-A8 processor running the latest Windows Embedded real-time operating system—at no extra cost—while providing access to other components for development of industrial and multimedia embedded designs.
hopobject.shortdesc: Arrow is bundling Windows Embedded Compact 7 with a BeagleBoard-xM
